_header: And as Thy word came on this wise
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 151.
Subjects: prayers; Christ, Passion of; Christ, address to Virgin Mary
_description: A prayer on the Words of Christ from the Cross — nine 6-line stanzas

CULDd576.First Lines:
And as þy worde ca[m] on þis wyseTo þe thefe with
                    þ[e] in paradyseSchulde abide with owten blame[ ]ies grawnte me
                    grace to warke all way…
CULDd576.Last Lines:
…Thorow prayer of þi modere freMaydene mare mylde
                    Amen
CULDd576.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 6-8.
